title: Re: AOR by San Diego County Republican Central Committee
summary:
This response relates to a request for an advisory opinion, but is informational only and is not an advisory opinion because it is based 

in part on proposed regulations of the Commission which were submitted to Congress but not yet made effective.  This response concerns 

the use of corporate funds by a local party committee.  This re: AOR is wholly superseded by AO 1980-89.
